mapper.insert: insert into library (user_id, list_no, list_img_src, list_type, isbn) values(#{user_id},#{list_no},#{list_img_src},#{list_type},#{isbn})
mapper.select: select count(list_no) from library where list_no=#{list_no}
select * from library where user_id=#{user_id} AND list_no<25 AND list_no >=0 order by list_no
select * from book b where exists(select b.isbn from library l where b.isbn = l.isbn and user_id=#{user_id})
mapper.update: update library set list_no=-1 where user_id=#{user_id} and isbn=#{isbn}
mapper.delete: delete library where user_id=#{user_id} and isbn=#{isbn}
